body_html:
@isaacgerg instructions how to get a windows build are here: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/cmake/README.md
Keras should work ok, I ran the Keras example directory with a tensorflow backend under windows+gpu some time ago and it was happy.

body:
@isaacgerg instructions how to get a windows build are here: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/cmake/README.md
Keras should work ok, I ran the Keras example directory with a tensorflow backend under windows+gpu some time ago and it was happy.
